comment: I was in Arlington through grad school, but I came back home to WV in March! I graduated in May and currently remotely interning for the National Security Commission On Artificial Intelligence... still hunting for a full-time job though
amr:
# ::snt I was in Arlington through grad school, but I came back home to WV in March! I graduated in May and currently remotely interning for the National Security Commission On Artificial Intelligence... still hunting for a full-time job though
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (c / contrast-01
            :ARG1 (b / be-located-at-91
                  :ARG1 (ii / i)
                  :ARG2 (c2 / county
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "Arlington"))
                  :time (t / through
                        :op1 (s / school
                              :mod (g / grad))))
            :ARG2 (c3 / come-01
                  :ARG1 ii
                  :ARG4 (c4 / county
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "WV"))
                  :direction (b2 / back)
                  :time (d / date-entity
                        :month 3)))
      :snt2 (a / and
            :op1 (g2 / graduate-01
                  :ARG1 (ii2 / i)
                  :time (d2 / date-entity
                        :month 5))
            :op2 (ii3 / intern-01
                  :ARG0 ii2
                  :ARG2 (g3 / government-organization
                        :name (n3 / name
                              :op1 "National"
                              :op2 "Security"
                              :op3 "Commission"
                              :op4 "On"
                              :op5 "Artificial"
                              :op6 "Intelligence"))
                  :time (c5 / current)
                  :manner (r / remote))
            :snt3 (h / have-concession-91
                  :ARG1 (h2 / hunt-01
                        :ARG0 ii2
                        :ARG1 (j / job
                              :mod (f / full-time))
                        :mod (s2 / still)))))
